infoIt.who_content: Sono un programmatore web, programmo con React.js, Bootstrap, HTML e CSS per il Front-End e Node.js e Django per il Back-End. Faccio principalmente siti vetrina.

infoEn.who_content: I am a web developer, I program with React.js, Bootstrap, HTML and CSS for the Front-End and Node.js and Django for the Back-End. I mainly do showcase sites.
